attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicle then look no further.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome.
We at Wingfield Motors Bellville strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. 
We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.description:
This wonder of a vehicle is made for the road and to dominate the off-road. This example is a 2003 Toyota Rav4 1.8 3dr, this Rav4 is ready to take on the toughest terrains. It come with power steering, electric windows, air conditioning, central locking remote, radio/CD/AUX input and excellent boot space to put your extra luggage. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
#10158

attributes.description:
Take advantage of this beautiful Mercedes Benz GLC 300. This vehicle is in a pristine condition and is a 1 owner vehicle which is still under plan until February next year. Don’t miss out! Drive in style


MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient
attributes.title: 2017 Mercedes-Benz GLC 300 Off-Road
